title: Composition of Functions: Part C
body: These questions are challenging, requiring mastery of each concept and their interrelations. Note that since $$0<1$$ $$\leq$$ $$x^2+1$$ for all values of $$x$$, the algebraic properties of inequalities imply that $$0<\frac{1}{x^2+1}$$ $$\leq$$ $$\frac{1}{1}=1$$. Thus, the function $$g(x)=\frac{1}{x^2+1}$$ is bounded.
